segments.text: I notice the woman standing there, completely zoned out on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying that plate like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is flooding, water everywhere on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle could make anyone slip and fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And her foot's already in itâ€” she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy's on that stool, it's tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll crash down with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, close enough to get hurt too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking treats, but this is dangerous play.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window lets in light, showing the safe garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's all potential accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them before something bad occurs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, that can't be good for the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR
